thread.title: Mrs S Boswell
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Mrs S Boswell

author: Mrs S Boswell
title: Mrs S Boswell
text: Eyelet curtains purchased for son's room. Well made and look good. Would have liked more fabric in each curtain, as when drawn look a bit 'stretched' but were well priced, compared to past curtain purchases. Son very pleased and will be ordering a blind to finish off the look.
